channel.title: W3C Web Authentication Working Group-relevant MDN issues
channel.description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by W3C Web Authentication Working Group

item.title: [webauthn-3] mistake in the ClientDataJSON parent object
item.content:encoded:
MDN URL

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/AuthenticatorResponse/clientDataJSON

What specific section or headline is this issue about?

Examples

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

i see a mistake in the property
const clientDataStr = arrayBufferToStr(pk.clientDataJSON);

What did you expect to see?

it should be
const clientDataStr = arrayBufferToStr(pk.response.clientDataJSON);

Do you have any supporting links, references, or citations?

No response

Do you have anything more you want to share?

No response
